verses.verse: And Dinah <S%H1783><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Leah, <S%H3812><s%> which <S%H834><s%> she bore <S%H3205><s%> unto Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

And when Shechem <S%H7928><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hamor <S%H2544><s%> the Hivite, <S%H2340><s%> prince <S%H5387><s%> of the country, <S%H776><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> her, he took <S%H3947><s%> her, and lay with <S%H7901><s%> her, and defiled <S%H6031><s%> her.

And his soul <S%H5315><s%> cleaved <S%H1692><s%> unto Dinah <S%H1783><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and he loved <S%H157><s%> <S%H853><s%> the damsel, <S%H5291><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> kindly <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3820><s%> unto the damsel. <S%H5291><s%>

And Shechem <S%H7928><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> Hamor, <S%H2544><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Get <S%H3947><s%> me <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> damsel <S%H3207><s%> to wife. <S%H802><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> he had defiled <S%H2930><s%> <S%H853><s%> Dinah <S%H1783><s%> his daughter: <S%H1323><s%> now his sons <S%H1121><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H854><s%> his cattle <S%H4735><s%> in the field: <S%H7704><s%> and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> held his peace <S%H2790><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> they were come. <S%H935><s%>
And Hamor <S%H2544><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> to commune <S%H1696><s%> with <S%H854><s%> him.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> came <S%H935><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the field <S%H7704><s%> when they heard <S%H8085><s%> it: and the men <S%H376><s%> were grieved, <S%H6087><s%> and they were very wroth, <S%H2734><s%> <S%H3966><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he had wrought <S%H6213><s%> folly <S%H5039><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%> in lying with <S%H7901><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jacob's <S%H3290><s%> daughter; <S%H1323><s%> which thing <S%H3651><s%> ought not <S%H3808><s%> to be done. <S%H6213><s%>

And Hamor <S%H2544><s%> communed <S%H1696><s%> with <S%H854><s%> them, saying, <S%H559><s%> The soul <S%H5315><s%> of my son <S%H1121><s%> Shechem <S%H7928><s%> longeth <S%H2836><s%> for your daughter: <S%H1323><s%> I pray you <S%H4994><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> her him to wife. <S%H802><s%>
And make ye marriages <S%H2859><s%> with <S%H854><s%> us, and give <S%H5414><s%> your daughters <S%H1323><s%> unto us, and take <S%H3947><s%> our daughters <S%H1323><s%> unto you.

And ye shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> with <S%H854><s%> us: and the land <S%H776><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you; dwell <S%H3427><s%> and trade <S%H5503><s%> ye therein, and get you possessions <S%H270><s%> therein.

And Shechem <S%H7928><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> her father <S%H1><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> her brethren, <S%H251><s%> Let me find <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and what <S%H834><s%> ye shall say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me I will give. <S%H5414><s%>

Ask <S%H7235><s%> <S%H5921><s%> me never so much <S%H3966><s%> dowry <S%H4119><s%> and gift, <S%H4976><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> according as <S%H834><s%> ye shall say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me: but give <S%H5414><s%> me <S%H853><s%> the damsel <S%H5291><s%> to wife. <S%H802><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H853><s%> Shechem <S%H7928><s%> and Hamor <S%H2544><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> deceitfully, <S%H4820><s%> and said, <S%H1696><s%> because <S%H834><s%> he had defiled <S%H2930><s%> <S%H853><s%> Dinah <S%H1783><s%> their sister: <S%H269><s%>

And they said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, We cannot <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3201><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing, <S%H1697><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> our sister <S%H269><s%> to one <S%H376><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is uncircumcised; <S%H6190><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> were a reproach <S%H2781><s%> unto us:

But <S%H389><s%> in this <S%H2063><s%> will we consent <S%H225><s%> unto you: If <S%H518><s%> ye will be <S%H1961><s%> as we be, that every <S%H3605><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> of you be circumcised; <S%H4135><s%>

Then will we give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> our daughters <S%H1323><s%> unto you, and we will take <S%H3947><s%> your daughters <S%H1323><s%> to us, and we will dwell <S%H3427><s%> with <S%H854><s%> you, and we will become <S%H1961><s%> one <S%H259><s%> people. <S%H5971><s%>

But if <S%H518><s%> ye will not <S%H3808><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> us, to be circumcised; <S%H4135><s%> then will we take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> our daughter, <S%H1323><s%> and we will be gone. <S%H1980><s%>
And their words <S%H1697><s%> pleased <S%H3190><s%> <S%H5869><s%> Hamor, <S%H2544><s%> and Shechem <S%H7928><s%> Hamor's <S%H2544><s%> son. <S%H1121><s%>

And the young man <S%H5288><s%> deferred <S%H309><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> the thing, <S%H1697><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he had delight <S%H2654><s%> in Jacob's <S%H3290><s%> daughter: <S%H1323><s%> and he <S%H1931><s%> was more honorable <S%H3513><s%> than all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of his father. <S%H1><s%>

And Hamor <S%H2544><s%> and Shechem <S%H7928><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> came <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> of their city, <S%H5892><s%> and communed <S%H1696><s%> with <S%H413><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of their city, <S%H5892><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> men <S%H376><s%> are peaceable <S%H8003><s%> with <S%H854><s%> us; therefore let them dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> and trade <S%H5503><s%> therein; for the land, <S%H776><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> it is large enough <S%H7342><s%> <S%H3027><s%> for <S%H6440><s%> them; let us take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> their daughters <S%H1323><s%> to us for wives, <S%H802><s%> and let us give <S%H5414><s%> them our daughters. <S%H1323><s%>

Only <S%H389><s%> herein <S%H2063><s%> will the men <S%H376><s%> consent <S%H225><s%> unto us for to dwell <S%H3427><s%> with <S%H854><s%> us, to be <S%H1961><s%> one <S%H259><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> if every <S%H3605><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> among us be circumcised, <S%H4135><s%> as <S%H834><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> are circumcised. <S%H4135><s%>

Shall not <S%H3808><s%> their cattle <S%H4735><s%> and their substance <S%H7075><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H929><s%> of theirs be ours? only <S%H389><s%> let us consent <S%H225><s%> unto them, and they will dwell <S%H3427><s%> with <S%H854><s%> us.

And unto <S%H413><s%> Hamor <S%H2544><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> Shechem <S%H7928><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that went out <S%H3318><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of his city; <S%H5892><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> was circumcised, <S%H4135><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that went out <S%H3318><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of his city. <S%H5892><s%>

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> on the third <S%H7992><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> when they were <S%H1961><s%> sore, <S%H3510><s%> that two <S%H8147><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> Simeon <S%H8095><s%> and Levi, <S%H3878><s%> Dinah's <S%H1783><s%> brethren, <S%H251><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> each man <S%H376><s%> his sword, <S%H2719><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> boldly, <S%H983><s%> and slew <S%H2026><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the males. <S%H2145><s%>

And they slew <S%H2026><s%> Hamor <S%H2544><s%> and Shechem <S%H7928><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> Dinah <S%H1783><s%> out of Shechem's <S%H7928><s%> house, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> and went out. <S%H3318><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> came <S%H935><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the slain, <S%H2491><s%> and spoiled <S%H962><s%> the city, <S%H5892><s%> because <S%H834><s%> they had defiled <S%H2930><s%> their sister. <S%H269><s%>

They took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> their sheep, <S%H6629><s%> and their oxen, <S%H1241><s%> and their asses, <S%H2543><s%> and that which <S%H834><s%> was in the city, <S%H5892><s%> and that which <S%H834><s%> was in the field, <S%H7704><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> their wealth, <S%H2428><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> their little ones, <S%H2945><s%> and their wives <S%H802><s%> took they captive, <S%H7617><s%> and spoiled <S%H962><s%> even all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was in the house. <S%H1004><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Simeon <S%H8095><s%> and Levi, <S%H3878><s%> Ye have troubled <S%H5916><s%> me to make me to stink <S%H887><s%> among the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> among the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> and the Perizzites: <S%H6522><s%> and I <S%H589><s%> being few <S%H4962><s%> in number, <S%H4557><s%> they shall gather themselves together <S%H622><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me, and slay <S%H5221><s%> me; and I shall be destroyed, <S%H8045><s%> I <S%H589><s%> and my house. <S%H1004><s%>
And they said, <S%H559><s%> Should he deal with <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> our sister <S%H269><s%> as with an harlot? <S%H2181><s%>
